Ginsenoside Rh2(
Three glycoside hydrolases (BglBX10, Abf22-3, and BglSk) were cloned in 
The designed bioconversion pathways show that Abf22-3 and BglBX10 were responsible for the conversion of Rb1, Rc and Rd → Rg3(
Our pilot data demonstrate that BglSk is a suitable enzyme for the gram unit production of ginsenoside Rh2(
